xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/938265-Building America in Bethlehem 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null This documentary film, completed in 2009, follows the conversion of one of the largest steel factories in America into a casino-entertainment center. It depicts a poetic and dystopian portrait of American industry and the city of Bethlehem, PA which was built around it. Building America in Bethlehem
